title: CHAPTER XII QUANTITY OF SEED REQUIRED
content: Name Ounces Pounds Drill Hills Acre Plants Asparagus 1 4–5 ? ? 1 200 Beans 1 1 50 ? ? ? Bush Lima 1 1 50 ? ? ? Pole Lima 1 1 75–100 ? ? ? Beets 1 5–6 50 ? 1 ? Brussels Sprouts 1 ? 200 ? ? ? Cabbage 1 4 ? ? ? 3000–4000 Cauliflower 1 ? ? ? ? 3000 Carrots 1 3–4 100 ? 1 ? Chicory 1 ? 100 ? ? ? Celery 1 ? ? ? ? 5000–6000 Cucumbers 1 2 ? 50 1 ? Corn Salad 3 ? 100 ? ? ? Collards 1 ? ? ? ? 3000 Eggplant 1 ? ? ? ? 1000–2000 Endive 1 ? 300 ? ? ? Kale 1 ? ? ? ? 5000 Kohl-Rabi 1 ? 300 ? ? ? Lettuce 1 ? ? ? ? 3000 Muskmelon 1 2–3 ? ? 1 ? Watermelon 1 4–5 ? ? 1 ? Onion 1 4–5 200 ? 1 ? Okra 1 ? 100 ? ? ? Parsley 1 ? 150 ? ? ? 201Parsnips 1 5–6 200 ? 1 ? Peppers 1 ? ? ? ? 1000–1500 Peas ? 1 50 ? ? ? Pumpkins 1 ? 25 ? ? ? Potatoes ? 13 ? ? ? ? Radishes 1 ? 100 ? ? ? Rhubarb 1 ? 125 ? ? ? Salsify 1 ? 50 ? ? ? Squash 1 3–4 ? 25 1 ? Spinach 1 10–12 100 ? 1 ? Tomatoes 1 ? ? ? ? 3000–4000 Turnips 1 1–2 200 ? 1 ? For those vegetables of which only a small quantity is grown the packets will be ample, most packets giving from one to two hundred plants, when started in the hotbed.

book.title: The Busy Woman's Garden Book
book.description: 简介： This little book has a very definite aima big aim too, though two little words or even one will serve to define itTo help, or better still, perhapshelpfulness. It does not aim to tell everything there is to tell about gardening; that would be encyclo...
